Name: tgrelid
column6: the table this trigger is on

Name: tgname
column6: trigger name (must be unique among triggers of same table)

Name: tgenabled
column6: controls in which session_replication_role modes the trigger fires. o = trigger fires in "origin" and "local" modes, d = trigger is disabled, r = trigger fires in "replica" mode, a = trigger fires always.

Name: tgisinternal
column6: true if trigger is internally generated (usually, to enforce the constraint identified by tgconstraint)

Name: tgconstrrelid
column6: the table referenced by a referential integrity constraint

Name: tgconstrindid
column6: the index supporting a unique, primary key, or referential integrity constraint

Name: tgconstraint
column6: the pg_constraint entry associated with the trigger, if any

Name: tgdeferrable
column6: true if constraint trigger is deferrable

Name: tginitdeferred
column6: true if constraint trigger is initially deferred

Name: tgnargs
column6: number of argument strings passed to trigger function

Name: tgattr
column6: column numbers, if trigger is column-specific; otherwise an empty array

Name: tgargs
column6: argument strings to pass to trigger, each null-terminated

Name: tgqual
column6: expression tree (in nodetostring() representation) for the trigger's when condition, or null if none
